text:
Created attachment 21980
Firefox 3 can load BXE

I know Firefox 3 isn't in final version but some of our users have installed the last Ubuntu who include the beta1, and BXE doesn't load anymore.

The problem can be fixed with the tiny patch in attachment.
creator: olivier.lustenberger@adm.unige.ch

text: Applied the tiny patch - Thanks to Olivier Lustenberger.
creator: ragaller@apache.org

text: BTW the problem does not occur in lenya 2.x - even though the script tags don't have any space in between - maybe some xslt prevents script tag collapsing in 2.0.x?
creator: ragaller@apache.org
